targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "ln" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias = 'ZAYO uplink'  GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "ln" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =  'new L3: ID 441140625' GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "ln" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias = 'Level 3 - Circuit ID BCTZ9433'  GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "ln" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1-pci-tx.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias = 'uplink ZAYO ID:174070'  GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "ln" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-tx.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias = 'uplink Level 3 ID: BDKV3574'  GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 AS "Out" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias = 'ZAYO uplink'  GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 AS "Out" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =  'new L3: ID 441140625' GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 AS "Out" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =  'Level 3 - Circuit ID BCTZ9433' GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 AS "Out" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1-pci-tx.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =  'uplink ZAYO ID:174070' GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 AS "Out" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-tx.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =  'uplink Level 3 ID: BDKV3574' GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifName = 'Po2'  GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifName =  'Po2' GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8  FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias = 'Trunk C1'  GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias = 'Trunk C1'  GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "Out" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias = 'Trunk C2'  GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8  FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =  'Trunk C2' GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias = 'Trunk C2-pci'  GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =  'Trunk C2-pci' GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "In" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =~/^peak|^hill|^bay|^veneer/   GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifName, ifAlias

SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "In" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =~/^peak|^hill|^bay|^veneer/   GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifName, ifAlias

SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 AS "Out" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =~ /^peak|^hill|^bay|^veneer/  GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifName, ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 AS "Out" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter   AND ifAlias =~ /CCI|MPLS/  GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifName, ifAlias

SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "In" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =~/^peak|^hill|^bay|^veneer/   GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifName, ifAlias

SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "In" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-ca.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =~/^peak|^hill|^bay|^veneer/ GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifAlias

SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 AS "Out" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c1.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =~ /^peak|^hill|^bay|^veneer/  GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifName, ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8 AS "In" FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =~/^peak|^hill|^bay|^veneer/ GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInOctets), 1s) *8  FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-ca.brightpattern.com'    AND $timeFilter and ifAlias =~/VLAN/ GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8   FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-ca.brightpattern.com'    AND $timeFilter and ifAlias =~/VLAN/ GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutOctets), 1s) *8 FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2.brightpattern.com' AND $timeFilter AND ifAlias =~/^peak|^hill|^bay|^veneer/  GROUP BY time($__interval),  ifAlias, ifName
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCInUcastPkts), 1s) FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-ca.brightpattern.com'    AND $timeFilter and ifAlias =~/VLAN/ GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
SELECT derivative(mean(ifHCOutUcastPkts), 1s)  FROM snmp WHERE hostname='c2-pci-ca.brightpattern.com'    AND $timeFilter and ifAlias =~/VLAN/ GROUP BY time(1m),  ifAlias
